title: How to Make a Skittle Bomb

steps.headline: Pour the Red Bull or any other energy drink into a Collins/highball/pub glass.
Put the Cointreau into the shot glass.
Drop the shot glass into the pub glass.
Add in any extra bits such as raspberry juice or something to add another particular flavor.
Drink as quickly as possible if desired.
steps.description: It should taste like Skittles. Be sure not to choke because of the shot glass inside.

steps.headline: Pour in the Absolut Vodka and Banana Liqueur to the Collins glass.
Fill the glass 3/4 full with Kool-Aid.
Stir until even with a spoon.
Garnish with a lime/lemon wheel or wedge if desired.

text: Using Red Bull Pour the Red Bull or any other energy drink into a Collins/highball/pub glass.  Put the Cointreau into the shot glass.  Drop the shot glass into the pub glass.  Add in any extra bits such as raspberry juice or something to add another particular flavor.  Drink as quickly as possible if desired. It should taste like Skittles. Be sure not to choke because of the shot glass inside. Using Vodka Pour in the Absolut Vodka and Banana Liqueur to the Collins glass.  Fill the glass 3/4 full with Kool-Aid.  Stir until even with a spoon.  Add in the crushed ice.  Garnish with a lime/lemon wheel or wedge if desired.  Serve and enjoy.
